description: This file defines a Zustand store for managing graph state in a web application, including nodes, edges, selection, read-only mode, and custom node/edge types, with functions to modify this state.

methods.name: id()
methods.description: Generates a unique identifier using nanoid or a fallback to Math.random if nanoid fails.

methods.name: setGraph
methods.description: Sets the entire graph data including nodes and edges.

methods.name: setNodes
methods.description: Updates the nodes array, using an updater function or a replacement array.

methods.name: setEdges
methods.description: Updates the edges array, using an updater function or a replacement array.

methods.name: setReadOnly
methods.description: Sets the read-only state of the graph interface.

methods.name: addNode
methods.description: Adds a new node to the graph with a unique id and default position and label.

methods.name: removeSelected
methods.description: Removes selected nodes and edges from the graph and clears the selection.

methods.name: registerNodeType
methods.description: Registers a custom node type with a specified name and component.

methods.name: registerEdgeType
methods.description: Registers a custom edge type with a specified name and component.
